name: places/ChIJg3pABpZZwokRR0H8YbMZ1OA

displayName.text: Nachmias Chiropractic: Nachmias Adam L DC

formattedAddress: 231 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 231 W 21st St, New York, NY 10011-8275, USA

originalText.text:
I have been a patient with Dr. Adam for almost 2 years. Dr. Adam practices traditional chiropractic. That means no fancy tools that some people use and call it an adjustment. No selling of nonsense products. No B.S.!!
While I live in Brooklyn, I work in Manhattan. So I appreciate the flexibility if I need to change my schedule or add in an extra session. The front desk staff, Crystal and Leon are truly the best! Professional and warm people that will make you feel welcome.

text.text:
I have been a patient with Dr. Adam for almost 2 years. Dr. Adam practices traditional chiropractic. That means no fancy tools that some people use and call it an adjustment. No selling of nonsense products. No B.S.!!
While I live in Brooklyn, I work in Manhattan. So I appreciate the flexibility if I need to change my schedule or add in an extra session. The front desk staff, Crystal and Leon are truly the best! Professional and warm people that will make you feel welcome.

originalText.text: Dr Adam and his team have been a blessing at a time when I felt like my body was betraying me. He is friendly and approachable and takes the time to explain exactly what's going on. He puts me at ease and makes me laugh. I always feel 10 times better after an adjustment. Crystal and Leon at the front desk hold it down! They are welcoming and patient with my many requests for appointments. They make me feel like family! The massage therapists they have on staff are ridiculously wonderful. The combination of therapies offered in this office make for a holistic and healing experience. I love having the option to come into his city location on the days I'm working in the office. More days, more adjustments! The consistent chiropractic therapy helps me maintain my back/neck health, increases my range of motion, and TBH contributes to my mental health.

originalText.text: I have been visiting Dr. Adam for chiropractic care for about 5 months regularly to treat shoulder and neck discomfort. I always leave Dr. Adam’s feeling straightened out and much better aligned, with lasting results. He’s very personable, and same with the chiropractic masseuse Rachel. I left a 30 minute session with her feeling reborn!!

originalText.text:
Dr Adam is the BEST in NYC! Totally recommend him. My son and I are feeling brand new after the adjustment. He talks you through step by step in the visit, very friendly, knowledgeable, and funny. Staff is kind. I was reluctant and scared to see a Chiroprator, but found him through my insurance.
Best 15 min appointment! Looking forward to doing the massage w/his trained massage therapist. So HAPPY to find him! Thank you.

originalText.text: No chiropractor has been able to give me the relief that Dr.Nachmias has. My adjustments have been better with each visit and he often has me laughing throughout the appointment. They also offer massage therapy, absolutely amazing!
